p: Using 1H NMR metabolomics, we analyzed soluble compounds of selected plant-based feeds supplemented either by insect larvae ( Hermetia illucens) meal, microalgae ( S. platensis) biomass or yeast ( Saccharomyces cerevisiae) protein fraction. A trial was implemented in rainbow trout to investigate the effect of each experimental feed on growth compared with trout fed plant-based feed or FM- and FO-based feed as a reference. Our results show that some of the feeds supplemented with alternative feedstuffs presented higher intensities of specific compounds compared to the plant-based feed. Some of these compounds are discussed for their potential impact on fish metabolism.
